Thus, the momentum resolved photoemission experiment indicates a considerable modification of the electronic structure of both, the Bi 2Se 3(0001) surface and of the BiI 3-film. At first view this comes as a surprise given the rather weak structural modification of the Bi 2Se 3(0001) surface, but recent theoretical studies have predicted the appearance of interface states even in vdW epitaxial interfaces
